docs.title: Welcome to the Fantasy Football Tool
docs.text: This is the documentation for the Fantasy Football Tool.

docs.title: Waiver Wire Bot
docs.text: The waiver wire bot can be used to automatically send waiver wire recommendations to a Slack channel.

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
1. Create a Slack App and a webhook URL.
  2. Set the webhook_url in your ff_tool.toml file.
  3. Set the league_id, current_week, and faab_budget in your ff_tool.toml file.
  4. (Optional) Configure the post_day and post_hour in your ff_tool.toml file.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
To run the bot, use the bot command:

poetry run ff-tool bot

docs.title: From PyPI
docs.text:
To install the Fantasy Football Tool from PyPI, run the following command:

pip install ff-tool

docs.title: From source
docs.text:
To install the Fantasy Football Tool from source, follow these steps:

  1. Clone the repository: bash git clone https://github.com/your-username/fantasy-football-tool.git
  2. Install dependencies using Poetry: bash poetry install
